title: Gensol Engineering bags Rs 302-cr contract from Mahagenco
description: Gensol Engineering Ltd has won "bid for the conceptualisation, engineering, provisioning, installation, testing, and commissioning of a state-of-the-art 62 MWAC crystalline solar PV technology grid interactive solar PV power plant ...in Maharashtra," the company said in a stock exchange filing.
